name: Tìr nam Fulmair
description:
The Land of Fulmars. A small island community on the far north west coast of Scotland is gripped by the latter stages of a long terrible winter. Many people have taken sick or died and most of the livestock has gone the same way. The colony of fulmars - an aggressive cliff dwelling seabird that is a vital resource for the survival of your community - hasn't settled in their usual high numbers. Rumours are beginning to spread that this misfortune might be the work of witchcraft. You are sent to the burial tombs to investigate..

Note: This really has a very very long way to go. Most features in place are in their placeholder form and you will frequently find dungeons that don't generate legally. This is a 7DRL 2022 entry, the current version was made from scratch in a weekend.

I've supplied two compiled versions: linux-x86.64,  linux-armhf.32bit and the source code. The source may be compiled on MAC but I haven't tested it with clang so there may be some problems.
